name: Classic Impact (Alpha)
description: A remake of the classic game called Space impact. If you remember, this game used to be on Nokia mobiles. Yes, the old monochrome display ones. Me and my friend decided to revive this,  as it was really successful back in it's time.  The enemies come at you the exact way like on the old mobile version - at least we tried. The game is currently in alpha stage, you can play the first two levels. If you find any bugs, please let us know. :)
